SHADHO
  • Docs »
  • Library Reference
  • View page source

Library Reference¶

Core¶

HyperparameterSearch(spec, ccs, wq_config[, …]) Perform distributed hyperparameter search.
OrderedSearchForest(spec) A collection of trees containing spaces to search.
ComputeClass(name, resource, value, max_tasks) Group distributed compute nodes by hardware properties.
WQConfig(name[, port, catalog, exclusive, …]) Data store for WorkQueue master and task configuration information.
WQFile(localpath[, remotepath, type, cache]) Representation of a file to send to/receive from a remote worker.

Specification Helpers¶

uniform(low, high[, strategy, rng, seed]) Create a uniform distribution over the given range.
ln_uniform(low, high[, strategy, rng, seed]) Create a uniform distribution over the given range scaled by e^x.
log10_uniform(low, high[, strategy, rng, seed]) Create a uniform distribution over the given range scaled by 10^x.
log2_uniform(low, high[, strategy, rng, seed]) Create a uniform distribution over the given range scaled by 2^x.
normal(mu, sigma[, strategy, rng, seed]) Create a normal distribution over the given range.
ln_normal(mu, sigma[, strategy, rng, seed]) Create a normal distribution over the given range and scaled by e^x.
log10_normal(mu, sigma[, strategy, rng, seed]) Create a normal distribution over the given range and scaled by 10^x.
log2_normal(mu, sigma[, strategy, rng, seed]) Create a normal distribution over the given range and scaled by 2^x.
randint(low, high[, step, strategy, rng, seed]) Draw random integers from the given range.
log10_randint(low, high[, step, strategy, …]) Draw random integers from the given range, scaled by 10^x.
log2_randint(low, high[, step, strategy, …]) Draw random integers from the given range, scaled by 2^x.
choose(values[, strategy, rng, seed]) Choose one of n categorical values.

Tree¶

SearchTree([root, values, priority]) Container for search trees and their metrics.
SearchTreeNode(name[, children, exclusive, …]) Interior n-ary tree nodes.
SearchTreeLeaf(name[, value, exclusive, …]) Values to generate during the search.

Search Spaces¶

BaseSpace Base class for other spaces.
ConstantSpace(value) A search space containing a single value.
ContinuousSpace([distribution, strategy, …]) A continuous real interval fit to a probability distribution.
DiscreteSpace([values, strategy, scaling, …]) A set of categorical values to be searched.

Search Strategies¶

random(distribution, *args, **kwargs) Randomly search a probability distribution.

Scaling Functions¶

linear(x[, coeff, degree]) Scale x linearly.
ln(x) Scale exponentially to base e.
log10(x) Scale exponentially to base 10.
log2(x) Scale exponentially to base 2.
